item.title: Part-time Computer Consulting Opportunity (sunnyvale)
item.description: Do you have the ability to read computer code like most people read detective novels? We are looking for PhD's with exceptional computer coding ability and experience to help analyze source code in C, C++, Java, Assembly or other languages. We can offer up to $50 per hour based on demonstrated ability for part time, convenient, mainly home-based consulting. If interested, please email cover letter and CV to coder@rascientific.com.
item.dc:title: Part-time Computer Consulting Opportunity (sunnyvale)
